action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Joel,
I hope you're doing well.
We would like to add a section for project images on our product page. I was thinking of creating a "Real Life Project" section just above the "Related Products" section.
  • The "Real Life Project" section should only be visible if photos or videos are added.
  • The layout should display multiple images (3 square images in a single row).
  • I have already created a project image gallery field called "project_image."
I have attached a screenshot to illustrate the concept.
Could you please assist in implementing this feature?

Kind Regards,

Samir Bhatta
 IT Support
 | Bachelors of IT |


Proudly Supporting

 ______________________

E:support@designtiles.com.au
P: (02) 9567 8971
A: 407 Princes Hwy, Rockdale, NSW 2216
wwww.designtiles.com.au
